revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Floccesy Ranch |image = [[File:Floccesy Ranch.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Floccesy Ranch. |tokens = 126,500 |location = Unova Route 20 }} '''Floccesy Ranch''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,503,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck || rowspan=6 rowspan=2|[[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Molly || rowspan=2|[[File:Purrloin.png|40px]] Purrloin, [[File:Sewaddle.png|40px]] Sewaddle |- | [[File:Mareep.png|40px]] Mareep |- | [[File:Azurill.png|40px]] Azurill || rowspan=2|[[File:Janitor.png|40px]] Janitor Orville || rowspan=2|[[File:Lillipup.png|40px]] Lillipup, [[File:Mareep.png|40px]] Mareep |- | [[File:Patrat.png|40px]] Patrat |- | [[File:Lillipup.png|40px]] Lillipup || rowspan=2|[[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Kenny || rowspan=2|[[File:Patrat.png|40px]] Patrat, [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Pidove.png|40px]] Pidove |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Riolu.png|40px]] Riolu || <center> 13,000,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}
